description.displayText:
Olha was my mother's caregiver for over 7 years.  I found her to be very reliable and trustworthy.  She was very knowledgeable about all aspects of her care, handling medical, doctors and nurses, cooking and cleaning and socializing.  My mother was bedridden the whole time so she totally depended upon Olha 24 hours a day for assistance.  (Except for her days off).  Even on her days off, she was very good with training the substitutes. They became best of friends and my mother's death was a deep loss to Olha.
We couldn't have asked for more from one person.
description.originalText:
Olha was my mother's caregiver for over 7 years.  I found her to be very reliable and trustworthy.  She was very knowledgeable about all aspects of her care, handling medical, doctors and nurses, cooking and cleaning and socializing.  My mother was bedridden the whole time so she totally depended upon Olha 24 hours a day for assistance.  (Except for her days off).  Even on her days off, she was very good with training the substitutes. They became best of friends and my mother's death was a deep loss to Olha.
We couldn't have asked for more from one person.
